channel.title: Homes on Dan Han
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Dan Han

item.description: I am a PhD Candidate in Policy Analysis at the Pardee RAND Graduate School, and a Visiting Graduate Student at the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health. My area of specialization is health policy. I work on studies in both US and international contexts, and often use insights from economics to guide my research. My research interest lies in health care payment policy and the economic behavior of hospitals. Recently I have also become interested in behavioral factors that underlie physician decision making.
